text: Ms. Ortega’s development team contributed ___ to the successful launch of the newest mobile application.
In order to meet production targets, inspection equipment that breaks down easily should be checked on a ____ basis.
____ you experience any problems with the building’s equipment, you should contact the property manager.
Employees must park in the ____ parking lot until the renovation of the company building is completed.
Although the assembly machine has been used for more than 20 years, it is still ____.
Medical ____ are supposed to investigate the characteristics and effects of newly developed materials.
Darwin Construction, renowned for its ____ designs, has won the bid for the Dalton City Library.
Please make sure that ____ address is correct in the designated section of the order form.
Mr. Thompson was ____ as the marketing director after a successful market development in Asia.
The Irwin City Tourist Information Office is ____ located in the center of the city.
